channel.description: Recent content in carplay on code.zoia.org

item.title: Why is a Lightning cable required for CarPlay
item.description: Wondering why CarPlay requires your iPhone to be conected via a Lightning cable? Engadget gives a hint. the CarPlay connection is based on the H.264 video protocol, and sends user input from the touchscreen back to your iDevice
